JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities:         Writes high quality code unit tests, builds, tests as per agreed timelines.         Participates in technical design and provides estimation.         Overcomes roadblocks and requires minimal oversight.         Becomes a go-to person in at least one area.         Takes initiatives to fix issues/tech debts before assigned to him/her         Exhibit strong problem-solving skills, helps other developers and demonstrates teamwork.         Has delivered projects with end-to-end accountability.         Keeps track of industry trends and introduces right tech/tools for a given job.      What we re looking for...       Excellent understanding of software engineering practices, Design Patterns, Data Structures, Algorithms.         8+ years of experience in a product-driven organization.         Excellent programming skills in Java/Kotlin.         Strong communication skills.         Strong sense of ownership, drive and ability to deliver results.         Should have experience in Reactive programming, Asynchronous programming and Unit Testing         Experience in Media is a plus (Camera, Audio, Video etc)
